title: Revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts 2005 to 2015
summary: In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2013.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 6.32 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 4.7 was reached at Year 2009
